# MarkdownFlow

> MarkdownFlow extends standard Markdown with AI intelligence to create personalized, interactive documents. Instead of writing static content for readers, you write prompts for AI agents that transform your instructions into personalized content adapting to each user's choices, preferences, and context. Core principle: You write prompts for AI, not content for humans.

MarkdownFlow (MDFlow) is a Markdown format extension that enables AI-powered, personalized, and interactive documents. With the tagline "Write Once, Deliver Personally" (一次创作，千人千面), it allows developers and content creators to build dynamic documents that adapt to each reader. The system is 100% compatible with standard Markdown while adding three simple extensions:

### Basic Syntax

1. **Variables**: `{{variable_name}}` - Dynamic content placeholders replaced with actual values
   Example: `Generate a welcome for {{user_name}} mentioning {{balance}}`

2. **Interactive Elements**: `?[%{{variable}}Option1|Option2|Option3]` - Buttons for user choices
   Example: `?[%{{level}}Beginner|Intermediate|Expert]`
   Input fields: `?[%{{name}}...Enter your name]` - Text input with placeholder

3. **Preserved Content**: `===content===` - Text that maintains exact meaning during AI processing
   Example: `Remember our motto: ===Innovation Through Simplicity===`

## Core Documentation

- [Getting Started](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/en/): Introduction to MarkdownFlow concepts and quick start guide
- [Core Concepts](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/en/getting-started/concepts/): Fundamental principles of writing for AI
- [Quick Start](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/en/getting-started/quick-start/): Build your first interactive document in 5 minutes
- [Integration Guide](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/en/getting-started/integration/): Add MarkdownFlow to your project

## Specification

- [Overview](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/specification/overview/): Complete MarkdownFlow syntax specification
- [Variables](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/specification/variables/): Dynamic content placeholders and variable system
- [Interactive Elements](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/specification/interaction/): Buttons and input fields for user interaction
- [Preserved Content](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/specification/preserved/): Content that maintains exact meaning during AI processing
- [How It Works](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/specification/how-it-works/): Technical architecture and processing pipeline

## SDKs & Libraries

- [markdown-flow-ui](https://github.com/ai-shifu/markdown-flow-ui): React component library with built-in UI elements
- [remark-flow](https://github.com/ai-shifu/remark-flow): React-markdown plugin for MarkdownFlow syntax
- [markdown-it-flow](https://github.com/ai-shifu/markdown-it-flow): Markdown-it plugin for MarkdownFlow syntax
- [markdown-flow-agent-py](https://github.com/ai-shifu/markdown-flow-agent-py): Python library for document transformation
- [markdown-flow-agent-go](https://github.com/ai-shifu/markdown-flow-agent-go): Go library for document transformation (coming soon)

## Examples & Playground

- [Interactive Playground](https://play.mdflow.run): Try MarkdownFlow with live examples
- [Template Patterns](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/getting-started/quick-start/): Hands-on walkthroughs of core patterns
- [Concept Deep Dive](https://markdownflow.ai/docs/getting-started/concepts/): Guidance on writing instructions for AI

- [Main Repository](https://github.com/ai-shifu/markdown-flow): Documentation, website, and development platform
- [GitHub Organization](https://github.com/ai-shifu): All MarkdownFlow projects and libraries
- [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/ai-shifu/markdown-flow/issues): Report bugs or request features
